params.taskId: Unique hash of the task that is being cancelled. {See LibTaskId-getTaskId}

params.execAddress: Address of contract that should be called by Gelato.
params.execData: Execution data to be called with / function selector if execution data is yet to be determined.
params.feeToken: Address of token to be used as payment. Use address(0) if TaskTreasury is being used, 0xeeeeee... for ETH or native tokens.
params.moduleData: Conditional modules that will be used. {See LibDataTypes-ModuleData}

returns.taskId: Unique hash of the task created.

params.execAddress: Address of contract that should be called by Gelato.
params.execData: Execution data to be called with / function selector if execution data is yet to be determined.
params.feeToken: Token used to pay for the execution. ETH = 0xeeeeee...
params.moduleData: Conditional modules that will be used. {See LibDataTypes-ModuleData}
params.revertOnFailure: To revert or not if call to execAddress fails. (Used for off-chain simulations)
params.taskCreator: The address which created the task.
params.txFee: Fee paid to Gelato for execution, deducted on the TaskTreasury or transfered to Gelato.
params.useTaskTreasuryFunds: If taskCreator's balance on TaskTreasury should pay for the tx.

returns._0: uint256 Fee amount to be paid.
returns._1: address Token to be paid. (Determined and passed by taskCreator during createTask)

params.execAddress: Address of contract that will be called by Gelato.
params.execSelector: Signature of the function which will be called by Gelato.
params.feeToken: Address of token to be used as payment. Use address(0) if TaskTreasury is being used, 0xeeeeee... for ETH or native tokens.
params.moduleData: Conditional modules that will be used. {See LibDataTypes-ModuleData}
params.taskCreator: The address which created the task.

params.execAddress: Address of contract that will be called by Gelato.
params.execSelector: Signature of the function which will be called by Gelato.
params.feeToken: Address of token to be used as payment. Use address(0) if TaskTreasury is being used, 0xeeeeee... for ETH or native tokens.
params.resolverHash: Hash of resolverAddress and resolverData {See getResolverHash}
params.taskCreator: The address which created the task.
params.useTaskTreasuryFunds: Wether fee should be deducted from TaskTreasury.

params.taskCreator: Address of task creator to query.

params.moduleAddresses: List of addresses for respective modules.
params.modules: List of modules to be set

cancelTask(bytes32).notice: Terminates a task that was created and Gelato can no longer execute it.

createTask(address,bytes,(uint8[],bytes[.notice: Initiates a task with conditions which Gelato will monitor and execute when conditions are met.

getFeeDetails().notice: Helper function to query fee and feeToken to be used for payment. (For executions which pays itself)

getTaskId(address,address,bytes4,(uint8[.notice: Helper function to compute task id with module arguments

getTaskId(address,address,bytes4,bool,ad.notice: (Legacy) Helper function to compute task id.

getTaskIdsByUser(address).notice: Helper func to query all open tasks by a task creator.

setModule(uint8[],address[]).notice: Sets the address of task modules. Only callable by proxy admin.

taskTreasury().notice: TaskTreasury contract where user deposit funds to be used for fee payments.

userdoc.notice: Ops enables everyone to have Gelato monitor and execute transactions.ExecAddress refers to the contract that has the function which Gelato will call.Modules allow users to customise conditions and specifications when creating a task.
